name: Angry Beers
description:
"Last news, beers are less and less demanded in nightclubs and heavy gambling dens, they are not the same golden barley juice that par excellence are in all the raves, the massive arrival of the calimochos has made this happen, being their sweet aroma of cardboard wine who drives the furry rockers of today crazy. "
But this would not end well, because a small group of radical beers from white brands to black beers and toasts would take power by force. Without any remedy, the beers will begin to be launched in kamikaze to the calimochos until their total destruction, in such a way that there is no trace of a drop of wine in the bars. But as much as they fight, there will always be a calimocho at some Spanish festival, so beers will not take it very seriously.
